Activate.name: Activate
Activate.description: Sets focus to the object, optional flags 'E' - activate & edit cell in browse, 'A' - additive activate in design mode.

IsVisible.name: IsVisible
IsVisible.description: Reports whether or not the Form window is visible.

Next.name: Next
Next.description: Moves focus to the next control, as if the user pressed the "Tab" key.

Prev.name: Prev
Prev.description: Moves focus to the previous control, as if the user pressed the "Shift-Tab" key.

Up.name: Up
Up.description: Moves the focus up as if the user pressed the "Up" cursor key.

Down.name: Down
Down.description: Moves the focus down, as if the user pressed the "Down" cursor key.

Tab_Order.name: Tab_Order
Tab_Order.description: Get/Set the order of the tabbed objects.  Flags supported - 'S' for structured format.

Right.name: Right
Right.description: Moves the focus to the object to the right,  as if the user pressed the "Right" cursor key.

Cancel.name: Cancel
Cancel.description: Cancels changes to the current record.

Fetch_Last.name: Fetch_Last
Fetch_Last.description: Fetches the last record in the current selection of records.

Fetch_First.name: Fetch_First
Fetch_First.description: Fetches the first record in the current selection of records.

Allow_Change.name: Allow_Change
Allow_Change.description: Specifies if data can be edited.

Output_File_Override.name: Output_File_Override
Output_File_Override.description: Override the Form printer output file.

Dialog_Low.name: Dialog_Low
Dialog_Low.description: Load and show a Form as a dialog.

Dial_Phone.name: Dial_Phone
Dial_Phone.description: Dials the phone number in the control.

Show_All.name: Show_All
Show_All.description: Turns off the current query and shows all records (subject to any base filter that was specified).

Last_Pressed.name: Last_Pressed
Last_Pressed.description: Returns the name of the last button pressed when a form is opened as a dialog.

Mode_Get.name: Mode_Get
Mode_Get.description: Returns the mode (VIEW, CHANGE, ENTER, QUERY, FIND) of the current window.

Active.name: Active
Active.description: Returns the name of the control that has focus.

Active_Drilldown.name: Active_Drilldown
Active_Drilldown.description: Returns the name of the deepest control that has focus.

GetActiveObjParent.name: GetActiveObjParent
GetActiveObjParent.description: Returns a pointer to the object with focus's container.

Active_Prev.name: Active_Prev
Active_Prev.description: Returns the name of the control that previously had focus.

Query_By_Form.name: Query_By_Form
Query_By_Form.description: Puts the form into Query-by-Form mode.

Query_Run.name: Query_Run
Query_Run.description: Runs the query specified in the Query-by-Form window.

Query_Clear.name: Query_Clear
Query_Clear.description: Clears entries from the Query-by-Form mode form.

Query_Mode.name: Query_Mode
Query_Mode.description: Switches the Query_by_Form form to either "Filter" or "Order" mode.

Name.name: Name
Name.description: Returns the name of the Form object (I.e. "Form").

Children.name: Children
Children.description: Returns the number of objects contained by the object.

Child.name: Child
Child.description: Returns a pointer to the specified child object contained by the object.

Class.name: Class
Class.description: Returns the class of the object.

Eval.name: Eval
Eval.description: Evaluate an expression in the context of an object.

Reference_Expression_Get.name: Reference_Expression_Get
Reference_Expression_Get.description: Return the reference expression to reconstruct a reference to the object.

Has_Method.name: Has_Method
Has_Method.description: Returns True if the Form object has the specified method.

Resynch.name: Resynch
Resynch.description: refetches the data for the current record and repaints the window - optionally limit resynch to a table.

SessionHandle.name: SessionHandle
SessionHandle.description: Returns the session handle of the Form window.

Variables.name: Variables
Variables.description: Returns a pointer to the variables defined at the Form level - optional flag for 'local,shared and global'.

Locate_Next.name: Locate_Next
Locate_Next.description: Finds the next record with a value matching Value. Searches all fields unless Fieldname is specified.

Locate_Prev.name: Locate_Prev
Locate_Prev.description: Finds the previous record with a value matching Value. Searches all fields unless Fieldname is specified.

Find_By_Form.name: Find_By_Form
Find_By_Form.description: Puts the form into Find_by_Form mode.

Find_Run.name: Find_Run
Find_Run.description: Runs the find specified in the Find_by_Form window.

Find_Next.name: Find_Next
Find_Next.description: Repeats Find_by_Form, finding the next record.

Find_Prev.name: Find_Prev
Find_Prev.description: Repeats Find_by_Form, finding the previous record.

Find_Clear.name: Find_Clear
Find_Clear.description: Clears entries from the Find_by_Form mode form.

Browse_View.name: Browse_View
Browse_View.description: Toggles the form window to Browse view.

Child_Enum.name: Child_Enum
Child_Enum.description: Return a CR-LF separated list of child objects.

Is_On_Last_Object.name: Is_On_Last_Object
Is_On_Last_Object.description: Returns .T. if the object is the last object on the form, as specified in the form's prompt order.

Property_Add.name: Property_Add
Property_Add.description: Adds a property if one doesn't already exists, sets property to value.

Property_Instance_Exists.name: Property_Instance_Exists
Property_Instance_Exists.description: Returns TRUE if property has been instanced for the object (not just is valid for object).

Set_Dirty.name: Set_Dirty
Set_Dirty.description: Indicate that layout needs to be saved.

Command.name: Command
Command.description: Send a command notification to an object that excepts commands.

Control_Create.name: Control_Create
Control_Create.description: Creates new controls in a layout.

Create.name: Create
Create.description: Creates on-the-fly layout from a definition for the table/set named.

Create_Design.name: Create_Design
Create_Design.description: Creates a new unnamed layout for the table/set named and invoke the editor.

Create_Saved.name: Create_Saved
Create_Saved.description: Creates a new saved layout for the table/set named.

Get_Width.name: Get_Width
Get_Width.description: Get width of a layout format.

Get_Height.name: Get_Height
Get_Height.description: Get height of a layout format.

Get_Row_Positions.name: Get_Row_Positions
Get_Row_Positions.description: Get list of row heights - cr-lf delimited string of row ending positions in inches.

Repaint.name: Repaint
Repaint.description: force a repaint of the control or window.

Remember_Initial.name: Remember_Initial
Remember_Initial.description: Remember position/size information into initial property list(s).

Reset_Anchors.name: Reset_Anchors
Reset_Anchors.description: Reset the anchors on objects based on x & y split (x/y less than one if axis ommitted).

ZOrder.name: ZOrder
ZOrder.description: Change the Z-Order of a window i.e. Back,Front.

Fields_Enum.name: Fields_Enum
Fields_Enum.description: Returns a list of fully qualified fields names that are used by an object (or its children).

Get_Field_Objects.name: Get_Field_Objects
Get_Field_Objects.description: Returns a list of objects names under an named object that are bound to the field.

to_xml.name: to_xml
to_xml.description: Save objects to xml, flags used to save element like 'Style'.

from_xml.name: from_xml
from_xml.description: Load objects from xml, flags used to save element like 'Style'.

visual_order_get.name: visual_order_get
visual_order_get.description: Return the visual order of the objects.

visual_order_set.name: visual_order_set
visual_order_set.description: Change the visual (rendering) order of the objects.

window_position.name: window_position
window_position.description: Centers a window in the client area.

Units_Get.name: Units_Get
Units_Get.description: Get the units objects properties are expressed in.

Record_At_Start.name: Record_At_Start
Record_At_Start.description: Return true if record is at start of view.

Record_At_End.name: Record_At_End
Record_At_End.description: Return true if record is at end of view.

Active_Navigation.name: Active_Navigation
Active_Navigation.description: Return the navigation level at which the active field changes.

oncreate.name: oncreate
oncreate.description: Called in design mode when the user places a new embedded form on a form.

AllowChangeStatus.name: AllowChangeStatus
AllowChangeStatus.description: Returns .t. if the layout allows editing

Archive.name: Archive
Archive.description: Create a archived copy of a form printout in Adobe Acrobat .PDF format.

BaseQueryRun.name: BaseQueryRun
BaseQueryRun.description: Sets the base filter/order for a form.

Change_Mode.name: Change_Mode
Change_Mode.description: Puts a form layout into Change mode.

Copy_Prev_Field.name: Copy_Prev_Field
Copy_Prev_Field.description: Copies the field from the previous record. Flag determines previous record - 1=last viewed, 2 = last physical, 3 = last logical.

Copy_Prev_Record.name: Copy_Prev_Record
Copy_Prev_Record.description: Copies the record that was current immediately before going into Enter mode. Flag determines previous record - 1=last viewed, 2 = last physical, 3 = last logical.

cursor_get.name: cursor_get
cursor_get.description: Get the insertion point of the cursor in the current field.

cursor_set.name: cursor_set
cursor_set.description: Set the insertion point at the specified position in the active object, if the object supports editing and is not read-only.

data_entry_style.name: data_entry_style
data_entry_style.description: Returns the layout's data entry style. If style is set to "system", returns the style as stet in the Registry

dialog.name: dialog
dialog.description: Load and show a Form as a dialog.

Dictionary_Get.name: Dictionary_Get
Dictionary_Get.description: Returns the dictionary in which the layout is stored. Modes: 1=dictionary, 2 = table/set name, 3 = primary table of set

Filter_get.name: Filter_get
Filter_get.description: Returns the filter expression of the current index/query

find.name: find
find.description: Finds the closest record matching the specified key value. If an exact match is found, returns "ExactMatch", else "ClosestMatch".

FindBy_DefinedKey.name: FindBy_DefinedKey
FindBy_DefinedKey.description: Find by key. Type 1 = index name, Type 2 = any expression.

find_and_replace.name: find_and_replace
find_and_replace.description: Displays the Find and Replace dialog box. If layout has Change mode restricted, then only Find tab is shown

indexsetdialog.name: indexsetdialog
indexsetdialog.description: Display the standard Index Select dialog

Index_Name.name: Index_Name
Index_Name.description: Returns the name of the current index/query

Index_pointer.name: Index_pointer
Index_pointer.description: Returns a pointer to the current index/query.

Index_Set.name: Index_Set
Index_Set.description: Sets the primary index of the top level table on a Form.

Index_SetExplicit.name: Index_SetExplicit
Index_SetExplicit.description: Sets primary index. Displays error message if index_name not found.

multi_select.name: multi_select
multi_select.description: Lets user create a query by selecting records manually

Navigator.name: Navigator
Navigator.description: Displays the Object and Fieldname navigator to go to selected objects/fields on the form.

Order_get.name: Order_get
Order_get.description: Returns the order expression of the current index/query

QueryRun.name: QueryRun
QueryRun.description: Applies a filter and order to the records displayed by a form.

QuickFilter.name: QuickFilter
QuickFilter.description: Does a Quick Filter on the current field, finding all records that match the current value

QuickSortExplicit.name: QuickSortExplicit
QuickSortExplicit.description: Sorts the record in a window based on values in a field object

QuickSortMultiFld.name: QuickSortMultiFld
QuickSortMultiFld.description: Displays the Custom Sort dialog box.

QuickSrchExplicit.name: QuickSrchExplicit
QuickSrchExplicit.description: Filters the record in a window based on values in a field object

QuickSrchMultiFld.name: QuickSrchMultiFld
QuickSrchMultiFld.description: Displays the multi-field Quick Filter dialog.

Quick_SearchExcl.name: Quick_SearchExcl
Quick_SearchExcl.description: Does a Quick Filter on the current field, eliminating all records that match the current value

Records_Get.name: Records_Get
Records_Get.description: Returns the number of records in a form's current query list.

Refresh.name: Refresh
Refresh.description: Refreshes all controls on the form.

refresh_fields.name: refresh_fields
refresh_fields.description: Executes the .refresh() method on each field object on a form

Refresh_Layout.name: Refresh_Layout
Refresh_Layout.description: Refreshes the form (same as the Refresh command on the menu)

Run_Saved_Query.name: Run_Saved_Query
Run_Saved_Query.description: Runs a saved query. If query_name is not specified, Alpha Five prompts for name.

select_text.name: select_text
select_text.description: Selects text in the current field starting at start_position, and highlighting number of characters specified by length. If length is 0, highlight to end of text.

Send.name: Send
Send.description: Sends a report printout via email. Format options are PDF, HTML, RTF and TXT. Email_client is 'default' or 'a5'.

ServerSideQueryRun.name: ServerSideQueryRun
ServerSideQueryRun.description: For use with an active-link table. Filters top level table of the form by running a query on the server. Returns records found. If table is not an active-link table, returns -1.

ServerSideQuery_Retract.name: ServerSideQuery_Retract
ServerSideQuery_Retract.description: Rolls back the most recent user applied server-side filter on the primary table of a form (assuming that the table is an active-link table).

ServerSideQuery_Show_All.name: ServerSideQuery_Show_All
ServerSideQuery_Show_All.description: Removes any user-applied, server-side filters on the primary table of a form (if that table is an active-link table).

ServerSideRefreshAll.name: ServerSideRefreshAll
ServerSideRefreshAll.description: For use with an active-link table. Refreshes all rows in the active-link table

SpecialQueries.name: SpecialQueries
SpecialQueries.description: Displays the Range Dialog and creates a query from the selected range of records

Toggle_FormBrowse.name: Toggle_FormBrowse
Toggle_FormBrowse.description: Toggles a from to browse mode and vice versa

toolbarchange.name: toolbarchange
toolbarchange.description: Called whenever the <form>.toolbar property is changed (via Xbasic)

ViewQueried.name: ViewQueried
ViewQueried.description: Opens a form and applies a filter and/or order expression. Style = "" for normal, "dialog", "hidden" or "hidden-dialog". If IsBaseQuery = .t. (default value), use cannot remove the filter expression.

ActivePrevDrillDown.name: ActivePrevDrillDown
ActivePrevDrillDown.description: Returns name of previously active object, drilling down into container objects (embedded forms and browses)

ChangeRecordDialog.name: ChangeRecordDialog
ChangeRecordDialog.description: Used in Field Rules, Table Lookup when user selects <New Record>

NewRecordDialog.name: NewRecordDialog
NewRecordDialog.description: Used in Field Rules, Table Lookup when user selects <New Record>

onAliasFields.name: onAliasFields
onAliasFields.description: Called internally by A5 when opening a form with a sub-form if the subform is bound to an aliased table where the alias does not match the tablename.

OnLoadChild.name: OnLoadChild
OnLoadChild.description: Called when Loading a sub-form for a child table. Change shortnames to longnames (in static RTF Objects)

Recno_goto.name: Recno_goto
Recno_goto.description: Goes to a specified record number

Swap.name: Swap
Swap.description: Swaps the form displayed in the current window.

ViewLinked.name: ViewLinked
ViewLinked.description: Opens a form and applies a filter and/or order expression. Link fields are automatically set when records are edited, or added. Style = "" for normal, "dialog", "hidden" or "hidden-dialog".

Zoom_to_record.name: Zoom_to_record
Zoom_to_record.description: Zooms to a form view of the current active record in an embedded browse. Style is "" for normal, "dialog", or "existing"
